title: lmfao Sion is broken dude.
body:
What the f*ck Riot please nerf that pos properly, all you did was give him like a minor scaling change on shield.

He's ridiculously broken, I don't think changing shield by a fraction is going to change this heap of bs of a champ.

replies.body:
Yeah he's pretty easy to counter huh. 

Who's next?

yorick lol, make him have 1 ms
